launches.description: The number of times the app has launched

hourofday.description: The hour in the day that the app launched

dayssincelastuse.description: Number of days since the app was last launched

runmode.description: Type of application format. Will change if on a smart device.

previousosversion.description: The version of the OS the last time the app launched

locale.description: The language the device is running under

carriername.description: The phone provider the device goes through

dayssincefirstuse.description: The number of days since the first launch of the application

dayofweek.description: The day of week that the app launched

launchevent.description: The name of the application launch event

previousappid.description: The id of the application the last time the app was launched

ignoredsessionlength.description: Used in calculating length of session

starttimestampseconds.description: The timestamp when the session started

previoussessionpausetimestampseconds.description: The timestamp when the previous session was paused (if applicable)

previoussessionstarttimestampseconds.description: The timestamp when the previous session was started
